author: NASS
description:
I used a new colorization technique , restored, and created a sound design for This rare 1898-1900 footage captures Southampton, the majestic Windsor Castle, the bustling streets of London, and the Irish Mail train, offering a unique glimpse into daily life at the turn of the 20th century.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

B&W Video Source: British Mutoscope & Biograph Co.

The British Mutoscope & Biograph Company, established in the late 19th century as a subsidiary of the American Mutoscope & Biograph Company, was a pioneering force in early British cinema. It was led by William Kennedy Laurie Dickson (W.K.L. Dickson), a key figure in the development of motion pictures and a former collaborator of Thomas Edison.
title: 1898-1900 England in Color [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design added
